suggestions.original: To improve the color contrast in the artwork, consider using a darker background to make the bright colors of the fireworks and airplanes pop even more. Additionally, you could add more shading or outlines to the children's clothing to create a more pronounced contrast between the different colors. This will help to enhance the overall visual impact and make the scene even more dynamic.
